name: Dice Tossing Game
description:
On New Years Eve I played Farkle with my family around the table and kept feeling like "I can make this". Well, I stayed up all night and at 8am Jan 1 I went to bed with a playable prototype. My further goal was to add cross-platform multiplayer and get it live on the Google Play store before starting work today. Guess what?! Here it is!

*Note* The multiplayer does not work from the Itch Embed. Try that from https://molyett.com/games
